sentences.en: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.cn: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.en: an Agatha Christie mystery
sentences.cn: 一部阿加莎•克里斯蒂的悬疑小说

sentences.en: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.cn: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.en: For years the teaching of acting has been shrouded in mystery.
sentences.cn: 多年以来表演教学一直蒙着神秘的面纱。

sentences.en: He often tells stories full of mystery.
sentences.cn: 他常讲些充满神秘色彩的故事.

sentences.en: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.cn: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

sentences.en: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.cn: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.en: In this way, he was able to solve the mystery.
sentences.cn: 就这样, 他终于解开了这个秘密.

sentences.en: It held more mystery than even the darkest jungle.
sentences.cn: 它甚至比最黑暗的丛林还更令人感到神秘。

sentences.en: It is an elaborate ceremony, shrouded in mystery.
sentences.cn: 仪式是精心筹划的，笼罩着一层神秘的色彩。

sentences.en: Modern weather forecasts try to take the mystery out of the meteorology.
sentences.cn: 现代天气预报试图揭开气象学的神秘面纱.

sentences.en: She's a bit of a mystery!
sentences.cn: 她这人有点来历不明!

sentences.en: That information may cast light on the mystery.
sentences.cn: 那项情报可能有助于查明那件疑案.

sentences.en: The affair is wrapped in mystery.
sentences.cn: 这件事疑云重重.

sentences.en: The flying saucer is yet an unsolved mystery.
sentences.cn: 飞碟仍然是未解之谜.

sentences.en: The history of the family is cloaked in mystery.
sentences.cn: 这个家族的家史披上了一层神秘的色彩.

sentences.en: The Italian economic miracle has always been a mystery.
sentences.cn: 意大利的经济奇迹一直是个谜。

sentences.en: The main building was also used for the enactment of mystery plays.
sentences.cn: 主楼还用于神秘剧的演出。

sentences.en: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.cn: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.en: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.cn: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.en: The woods have an aura of mystery.
sentences.cn: 林子里有一种神秘的气氛.

sentences.en: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.cn: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.en: We set out to find the truth behind the mystery.
sentences.cn: 我们开始着手揭开谜团背后的真相。

sentences.en: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.cn: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

words.tran_cn: 神秘的；不可思议的；难解的
神秘地；故弄玄虚地；难以理解地
神秘化；困惑不解；骗人的把戏
使神秘化；使迷惑，使困惑

trans.tran_cn: 秘密，谜，神秘，神秘的事物，推理小说，推理剧，常作 mysteries 秘技，秘诀
trans.tran_en: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it
